creator: renato.ghica@bankofamerica.com
text:
I need a way to put a file using the FTP task, with a different file name.
ie 
ftp> put file.txt newfile.txt

I need to do this in one shot, without renaming in between, since the receiving 
site will process the file as soon as it sees it.

Couldn't you first copy the file to a temporary location on the client machine,
rename it there, then PUT the renamed file onto the server?
creator: scohen@apache.org
